text:
This austerity is related with the worship of lord Surya Narayan who is also known by several other names like Aaditya,Bhaskar,Ravi,Bhanu,Diwakar,Prabhakar,etc.
A devotee should observe a fast on the seventh day of any month and worship lord Suryanarayan.
The fast should be broken on the next day-ashtami.
A devotee can continue this ritual for one year following the above mentioned rituals.
 A devotee who observes the rituals of this austerity becomes free from all kind of diseases and enjoys a healthy life.
title: Aarogya-Vrata
